suite.name: Visit

kw.name: Open Application
kw.doc: Opens a new application to given Appium server. Capabilities of appium server, Android and iOS, Please check https://github.com/appium/appium/blob/master/docs/en/writing-running-appium/server-args.md | *Option* | *Man.* | *Description* | | remote_url | Yes | Appium server url | | alias | no | alias |

kw.name: Remove Files
kw.doc: Uses `Remove File` to remove multiple files one-by-one.

kw.name: Remove Files
kw.doc: Uses `Remove File` to remove multiple files one-by-one.

kw.name: Set Screenshot Directory
kw.doc: Sets the directory where screenshots are saved.

kw.name: Start Gif Recording
kw.doc: Starts the recording of a GIF in the background with the specified ``name``. The recording can be stopped by calling the `Stop Gif Recording` keyword.

kw.name: Run Keywords
kw.doc: Executes all the given keywords in a sequence.

kw.name: Launch Application
kw.doc: Launch application. Application can be launched while Appium session running. This keyword can be used to launch application during test case or between test cases.

kw.name: Go To Url
kw.doc: Opens URL in default web browser.

kw.name: Quit Application
kw.doc: Quit application. Application can be quit while Appium session is kept alive. This keyword can be used to close application during test case or between test cases.

kw.name: Run Keywords
kw.doc: Executes all the given keywords in a sequence.

kw.name: Stop Gif Recording
kw.doc: Stops the GIF recording and generates the file. If ``embed`` argument was set to ``True`` the GIF will be displayed in the log file.

kw.name: Close Application
kw.doc: Closes the current application and also close webdriver session.

suite.doc: Teste para validar visita no chrome
